The Node Toolbar


Figure 1. The Node Toolbar


Toolbar option

Allows you to

For more information

 Question Node

Create a new Question Node in the currently active view by dragging and dropping this node into the view.

See Creating Nodes

 Answer Node

Create a new Answer Node in the currently active view by dragging and dropping this node into the view.

See Creating Nodes

 Map Node

Create a new Map Node in the currently active view by dragging and dropping this node into the view.

See Creating Nodes

 List Node

Create a new List Node in the currently active view by dragging and dropping this node into the view.

See Creating Nodes

 Pro Node

Create a new Pro Node in the currently active view by dragging and dropping this node into the view.

See Creating Nodes

 Con Node

Create a new Con Node in the currently active view by dragging and dropping this node into the view.

See Creating Nodes

 Reference Node

Create a new Reference Node in the currently active view by dragging and dropping this node into the view.

See Creating Nodes

 Note Node

Create a new Note Node in the currently active view by dragging and dropping this node into the view.

See Creating Nodes

 Decision Node

Create a new Decision Node in the currently active view by dragging and dropping this node into the view.

See Creating Nodes

 Argument Node

Create a new Argument Node in the currently active view by dragging and dropping this node into the view.

See Creating Nodes
